name: .W3G File Extension
summary: Learn about .W3G files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A W3G file is a recording of a Warcraft III game. It includes all activity of a scenario or match from start to finish. W3G files are saved automatically in the WarCraft III installation folder. They are overwritten the next time a game is played, if you have not copied and saved them manually.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
